name: Wolf Tee
description:
Printed on Gildan Softstyle Shirts, Hope Won't Fade has teamed up with UKWCT (UK Wolf Conservation Trust), to create this t-shirt. £5 from every t-shirt sold will go to the trust, and to find out more about what they do, head here: http://ukwct.org.uk/

Also, if you have pre-ordered the 'Superfan' album bundle, your t-shirt will be sent to you immediately, others can be collected at the merch desk before the Summer Shows (August 15-17th)

Available Sizes: (Chest Size)

Small: 34-36''
Medium: 38-40''
Large: 42-44''
X-Large: 46-48''

Please use a 'contact' form, found at the bottom of the page, to place orders and specify your shirt size. Thanks! n_n

name: Badges
description:
High quality, glossy finish, 25mm Button Badges, with metal pins (no cheap plastic ;))

Available with 5 different designs, please specify your choice using the drop down list.

From Left to Right: 

Hope Badge, 
Fantasies Logo Badge, 
Tree Badge, 
Mountain Badge,
Bird Badge.

Individual Badges: £1 or you can get a set of all 5 for £5, in a little bag.


Thanks! n_n

name: Pocket Mirrors
description:
Perfect as a little gift or a treat for yourself, light, high quality, pocket mirrors.

Each mirror is themed around different songs (see details below). The mirrors have a design on one side, and the mirror face on the rear. Many of the lyrics are from songs on the new album.

From Left to Right:

Eternity Mirror - 'This Heartbeat Is Eternity'

Supernova Mirror - Featuring the artwork for the new album

Rhythm Of The Tides Mirror - 'When the waves start to slip away, within hours, they'll come crashing back again'

Polaris Mirror - 'With you, I'll never walk in the dark'

In Prayer Mirror - 'Eyes will lock, Time will stop, no world will come between us'

Individual Mirrors - £3

Set of all 5 - £15 (+A free copy of my EP Fantasies)

Happy Shopping!

name: Handwritten Lyric Sheet/Bookmark
description:
Please use the 'note to seller' section when checking out, to specify your lyric choice.

Options:

1. Handwritten Lyric Sheet - Have the lyrics of any HWF song written out on either a watercoloured piece of card or with a photo that links to the song. (Please specify your song choice and preference in the 'note to seller' area when you check out. Alternatively, you can use a 'contact' form to e-mail your preferences. (£1)

OR

2. Lyric Bookmark - Double-sided card bookmark, painted using watercolours, with any line from a HWF song handwritten on one side. (Please specify your lyric choice in the 'note to seller' area when you check out. Alternatively, you can use a 'contact' form to e-mail your preferences.) (£1)

3. Handwritten Lyric Sheet & Lyric Bookmark - £1.50

Thanks for your support!

name: Supernova Superfan Bundle (Limited copies available)
description:
Packaged in handmade and designed keepsake box & with a handwritten message introducing you to the album, signed numbered and personalised:

*Deluxe, Extended Album (17 tracks)
* Instrumental & Alternate Album CD
* Lyric Booklet
*Show Entry
*Album Download (+Songwriter's Log)
*Hope Won't Fade Bookmark
*x3 Handwritten Lyrics sheets 
*Option to pick a song for the set list
*Get the bundle a week in advance, before the show & release date

**When you purchase this bundle, your name will go into a draw to win my Song Writing book, used to keep notes through this entire album process, containing lyrics, songs that didn't make the album, chord charts, artwork sketches and ideas for the album itself. The draw will take place during the interval of the show.

*There will only be limited copies of this bundle made, so don't miss out!
